Reviews.Title: “Poor, very poor”
Reviews.Author: El_Baggira
Reviews.Content: wrote feedbacks hoteliers wrote feedbacks themselves start booked twin ensuit weeks advance little bit called booked surprised charged £60 pn website £50 checked website prices adjusted recently – it’s £65 pn twin ensuit arrived joyce arrive 1300 ready told ready 1415 ok wasting time travelled cornwall coach 845 hours exhausted desperate rest 1416 … ready outside wondering fortunately allowed leave luggage wondering little bit easier 3pm managed people – single bed double booked twin tiny – chance door moving suitcase bathroom tiny maybe bigger 25 sqm bathroom door lock broken inside can’t lock door outside can’t release yourself help person moment shower curtain dirty bottom shower covered lime scale sink straight front person engaged single bed wash brush teeth splashing reaches single bed person’s tv – tv maintained analogy tv date result watch 5 channels pictures tvs replaced digital reception imposed hoteliers booked english breakfast contained fried egg slices bacon bacon cooked crisp bacon flavour cooked bacon partially english breakfast toasts ok day marmalade tub served unsealed reached additionally door guests noisy disturbed guests gentile complaint joyce replied people children care children public applicable – children due behaviour door guests friend fall asleep half night bed wall divided internet available

Reviews.Title: “It's very Victorian”
Reviews.Author: Vkie
Reviews.Content: price paid actually exceeded expectation price paid central london tube access corner 5 minutes walk served breakfast requested time staff especially joyce pleasant accommodate demand left luggage safe hand checked cause wanna lil bit trips london heading heathrow requested checkin checkout prior demanding hotel accommodative ensuite adequate bed comfort yes decoration lil bit outdated fine actually kinda define lil bit victorian incredible friend amazing stay thank joyce hotel love malaysian vickie

Reviews.Title: “perfect budget accomodation”
Reviews.Author: kaykev08
Reviews.Content: stayed late november 2009 2 nights pleasantly suprised arrived arrival flight staff happy look bags till correct check time tried current guest vacated hadnt happily secured bags returned sight seeing buckingham palace round corner suprised read bad reviews suprised completely adequate own ensuite travelling teenage daughter happy amount tourist tend time sightseeing minimal time sleep change clothes breakfast satisfactory price accomodation suprised getting cooked breakfast australia cost lodgings dont cooked breakfast included unless pay extra toast cereal tea coffee hot bacon eggs welcome treat suffering jet lag husband daughters reccomendation breakfast accolades liked decided stay return uk october 2011 time stay week happy service time happy return recommended friends prefer budget holidays

Reviews.Title: “Very good location and value for money with an excellent, friendlier and prompt service”
Reviews.Author: Sam_Eddie
Reviews.Content: travelled london family wife 3 kids ages 7 8 10 4th 11th june 2010 opted stay hotel due close proximity victoria stations coach rail underground 100200 meters stations amazing hospitality friendlier service manageress joyce staff feeling expected night day arrived family time vacant little hassle sharing toilets attend children toilets night family attached bathroom convenient privacy booked earlier breakfast served exactly time time requested continental andor english breakfast day towels bed linen changed daily assume service exceeded requirement bb hotel facing warwick noise disturbing road busy night carrying suitcases narrow stairway difficult staff offer help thanks girls return flight evening allowed baggage checking safe chamber basement free charge thanks joyce
